name: Extra Credits (Jared Slawski)
description:
The credits are rolling on the end of the world, but Earth isn't giving up without a fight! Take control of a space ship as you defend your planet against the onslaught of letters that spell out your imminent doom.

Grab power-ups to help you along the way, and shoot bonuses that allow you to freeze time, create barriers, and even summon black holes!

It's up to you to ensure that Earth lives to see its encore!

Collaborated with a team of 3. I was responsible for sound design, mechanics implementation, basic difficulty scaling, and random power-up generation.
